stingtra i see your connection with shredder. I wish you to view the message that i also have given him to see. It may interest you.. 

  Yanshosh@... wrote: 

::Shredder/Zardus::

Shredder follows the screams, flying toward Stingtra and Wrath. He looks down 
at the two, deciding who to fire at.

Having made his decision, he deactivates his jetpack, flipping in the air and 
landing on his feet with two chainguns out. Without hesitation, he opens full 
fire on Wrath.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Flying toward the Alliance base with Oinker hopefully following him, Zardus' 
internal computer beeps, then reports.

"Audio bug has transmitted message."

Zardus' evil face twists into a grin. "Excelent. Replay message."

Following an affirmative beep, Zardus' intternal comp replays the message.

"At last!" DeathStorm's voice sounds in his head, "The Alliance shall be 
mine!"

Zardus chuckles. So, the assassin has decided to try and take over. Very 
well, a challenge is welcome.

Zardus speeds up, heading toward the Alliance base in a much better mood.
